alert.note: Alert for Athens; Meigs (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:43PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Meigs, southeastern Athens, west central Wirt, north central Jackson and southwestern Wood Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 543 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pomeroy, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Parkersburg, Belpre, Coolville, Forked Run State Park, New Haven, Washington, Tuppers Plains, Lubeck, Chester, Syracuse, Belleville, Reedsville, Darwin, Blennerhassett, Rockport, Morristown and Portland. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 156 and 169. Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
